name: thefriendlymotivator
0:
”Alexa, ask the friendly motivator daily motivation”
”Alexa, ask the friendly motivator daily motivation I need motivation”
”Alexa, open the friendly motivator daily motivation and help motivate me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the friendly motivator daily motivation
des:
The Friendly Motivator skill is meant to help users feeling down. Simply ask for some motivation and quickly get an upbeat response to help make you happier. It currently changes its response each time to excite users in different ways.
This Skill was not created or endorsed by Amazon
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
